entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
